Items.Title: Oversight - The City’s Efforts to Remove Graffiti From Bridges, Overpasses, Arterial Highways and other Areas Under Control of the City and State Departments of Transportation
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The City’s Efforts to Remove Graffiti From Bridges, Overpasses, Arterial Highways and other Areas Under Control of the City and State Departments of Transportation

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the removal of graffiti from commercial and residential buildings, and in relation to establishing a process whereby the city may clean graffiti from these buildings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Imposing a fine against the owners of commercial buildings and residential buildings of six or more units who do not remove graffiti from their premises.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to graffiti fines and penalties.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the sale of aerosol spray paint cans, broad tipped indelible markers or etching acid.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Sale of aerosol spray cans, broad tipped indelible markers or etching acid.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the possession and sale of graffiti instruments.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Possession and sale of graffiti instruments.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Oddo, Gallagher and Brewer

Items.Title: Oversight - The City’s Efforts to Remove Graffiti From Bridges, Overpasses, Arterial Highways and other Areas Under Control of the City and State Departments of Transportation
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Imposing a fine against the owners of commercial buildings and residential buildings of six or more units who do not remove graffiti from their premises.
